name: Incomplete landscapes
description: This works consists of a series of imaginary, generative landscapes made entirely of lines of light to be projected on a wall. The scenes are incomplete and large parts of missing vectors create abstract geometric patterns in motion. The piece is currently running from a heavy software, and once purchased, the code will be optimized for the blockchain / ipfs and the installation will be delivered to the collector in July 2021. Resolution: vector / infinite, it will adapt itself to the native resolution of the display. Alternatively, the work may be shown on LED or LCD screens. This piece is available as an auction, offers can be made on Lemercierâ€™s collectors Discord: https://discord.gg/f4WwvueDV6
